thread.title: Penton's SpeedNews 16th Annual Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference in Toulouse To Be Held September 14-16, 2015
thread.title_full: Penton's SpeedNews 16th Annual Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference in Toulouse To Be Held September 14-16, 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Penton's SpeedNews 16th Annual Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference in Toulouse To Be Held September 14-16, 2015
text:
Penton
NEW YORK , Sept. 14, The SpeedNews 16th Annual Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference in Toulouse (AISCT-16) , presented by Penton's SpeedNews , the source for aviation news and information, will take place from September 14-16 , 2015. The event, to be held at the Hotel Palladia, brings together aircraft and engine manufacturers, maintenance companies and subcontractors for a comprehensive agenda of aviation market forecasts and industry briefings as well as opportunities to forge new business connections. To register, visit http://speednews.com/aviation-industry-suppliers-conference-in-toulouse/registration .
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150910/265385LOGO
AISCT-16 offers equipment manufacturers and suppliers, producers of raw materials and technologies, and professionals in aviation marketing, business development and analysis with the exclusive opportunity to hear aircraft delivery and retirement forecasts, aeroengine market and OEM product updates, and a review of the financial status of the aviation industry. Scheduled speakers include representatives from:
Airbus
Avions de Transport Regional (ATR)
Bank of America â€“ Merrill Lynch
BOC Aviation
Boeing Commercial Airplanes
Bombardier
CFM International
Counterpoint Market Intelligence
CTAIRA
DVB Bank
Embraer
ICF International
KMUE Consult
Liebherr-Aerospace
Mitsubishi Aircraft Corporation
MTU Aero Engines
Pratt & Whitney
Roland Berger Strategy Consultants
Rolls-Royce
SAFRAN Snecma
UBS
AISCT-16 is co-located with the Third Annual European Aerospace Raw Materials & Manufacturers Supply Chain Conference, to be held on September 14 .
Sponsors of the Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference include Safran Snecma, Avions de Transport Regional (ATR), Verify, Norsk Titanium, Airbus, Aero Metals Alliance, Quest, and CFM International .
Information on registration or promotional opportunities for the event is available at http://speednews.com/aviation-industry-suppliers-conference-in-toulouse/information or by calling +1-424-465-6501. On Twitter, follow @speednewsconf ( https://twitter.com/speednewsconf ). For information about all SpeedNews events, visit http://speednews.com/all/conference .
ABOUT PENTON'S AVIATION WEEK NETWORK
Penton's Aviation Week Network is the largest multimedia information and services provider for the global aviation, aerospace and defense industries that has a database of 1.2 million professionals around the world. Industry professionals rely on Aviation Week for analysis, marketing and intelligence. Customers include the world's leading manufacturers, suppliers, airlines, business aviation operators, militaries, governments and other organizations that serve this global market. The product portfolio includes Aviation Week & Space Technology , AC-U-KWIK, Aircraft Blue Book, Airportdata.com, Air Charter Guide, Air Transport World , AviationWeek.com, Aviation Week Intelligence Network, Business & Commercial Aviation , ShowNews , SpeedNews , Fleet and MRO forecasts, global maintenance, repair and overhaul (MRO) tradeshows and aerospace & defense conferences.
ABOUT PENTON
Penton is an innovative information services company that empowers nearly 20 million business decision makers in markets that drive more than 12 trillion dollars in purchases each year. Our products inform with rich industry insights and workflow tools; engage through dynamic events, education and networking; and advance business with powerful marketing services programs. Penton is the way smart businesses buy, sell and grow.
Headquartered in New York , Penton is privately owned by MidOcean Partners and Wasserstein & Co., LP. For more information, visit http://www.penton.com or follow us on Twitter @PentonNow.
